talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$White Dragon Iona$
Umm~ {user_nick}, did you say you're going to talk to Elf Elder?

$White Dragon Iona$
I will stay here so come back when you're done!
I will talk to the other adventurers too~!
(Iona waves his hand. Go to Elf Elder.)

$Elf Elder$
{user_nick}. Looking for me?

${user_nick}$
Elder, I have something to tell you.
It's about the king of the Dragon Followers… the Red Dragon and the Monolith.

$Elf Elder$
That's...

${user_nick}$
You mentioned last time maybe you should tell me about the Monolith. But I have learnt about the Monolith from someone else. It's a medium that links our world to the Goddess… and it might mean the end of this world when the Monolith is under danger.

$Elf Elder$
That is right. You've found out about it already.

${user_nick}$
It has already been proven that the Red Dragon is heading towards the Monolith. I dno't know what he wants, but we should stop him before some chaos occurs. But… don't you think we don't have enough manpower?

$Elf Elder$
But guarding the Monolith was our responsibility, not the humans. We have to stop another chaos from happening.

${user_nick}$
Of course, I wouldn't want to instill fear in other people… But if we keep quiet when we know that this world is near danger, I don't think it's keeping our duty. That would be evading responsibility .

$Elf Elder$
(Elf Elder ponders for a while before opening his mouth)
Monolith isn't a place that can be entered easily. Even if other people come here to help us, all they can do would be to stop the Dragon Followers from going near the Monolith.

${user_nick}$
Isn't that the same for us too..?

$Elf Elder$
(Looks perplexed)
Yes, probably. But Elves would be able to stand a little more than ordinary humans.

$Elf Elder$
After this world was created, no one has reached the truth of the Monolith.
The Monolith remained unknown, so it was enough for the Elves to keep the secret. Even the Elders do not know what the Monolith really is.

${user_nick}$
So don't we need the help of more people?
Relying on one another is not something that the Elves should be ashamed about.

$Elf Elder$
(He gazes at you)You've become stronger. {user_nick}… You're almost like the former Queen Narcilia… But you don't know yet. Working together with other people also means that you will be responsible for the power of other people.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm not sure about the weight but I won't run away from it.</html>
<html>I wouldn't have suggested collaborating with other people if I didn't think about the weight.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Elder$
Do you know how heavy the weight of responsibility would be?

$Elf Elder$
(Smiling faintly like it almost can't be seen)
Is that so… You are making the same decision as her.
Maybe this time… this choice will bring a better outcome.

$Elf Elder$
If they try to give help first, I wil gladly accept it.

${user_nick}$
Okay!
(Go to Iona and tell him that things went well)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course. I'm feeling fine. What's wrong?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
(He looks flustered and realizes you have come)
Oh, {user_nick}! Let's see. You're still fine, that's a relief. ou don't look sick.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The one who received your help must be thankful.</html>
<html>It's not something to be sorry about. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
Yeah hehe. It's nothing.
There was a friend that I wanted to be close to. I helped my friend and... somehow felt sorry.
I anyhow... No, it was a good deed, something that I ought to have done.

$White Dragon Iona$
Heheh do you think so? I hope that friend feels that way too….
That friend is kind-hearted and seemed difficult to accept it.
I'm happy that I met many good adventurers.
(Iona smiles innocently)

${user_nick}$
Many adveturers? Have you met other adventurers and sought their help?

$White Dragon Iona$
Hehehe of course! And they all agreed.
Looks like it went well for you too. You look happy!
(Iona nods with a contented smile)

${user_nick}$
Of course. Elf Elder is a wise man.

$White Dragon Iona$
…That's great. But {user_nick}… I have something to tell you… I mean, something I must tell you.

${user_nick}$
What is it?

$White Dragon Iona$
…I don't want other people to hear about it.(Iona smiles innocently)
Let's go to Forest of Waiting Noon.
There are not many people there.

${user_nick}$
Hmm… Okay.
(Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Waiting Noon)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

$White Dragon Iona$
….You're here! {user_nick}.
I'm sorry to make you come all the way here.

${user_nick}$
It's okay. What did you want to tell me about?

$White Dragon Iona$
…You know… actually I had something I wanted to ask an Elf if I met one.
I know many things, but I forget many things too.

${user_nick}$
I will gladly help you if it is within my means.

$White Dragon Iona$
…What is this thing called "Telesia"?
I have the word inside my brain but I don't remember what is means.

${user_nick}$
I can't clearly explain what Telesia is, Iona. I'm trying to understand what it is too.
All the Elves I have met so far also have different understanding of Telesia too.
But if I think about it, I think they were all saying that everyone was bound to follow their Telesia.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Is that the Elves' Telesia? It's difficult to understand.
(Iona looks confused)
Then am I here because of Telesia too?

${user_nick}$
I'm not sure.
But based on what I have experienced so far, I feel that Telesia is what appears in front of us when we don't run away from our fate.

$White Dragon Iona$
Hehe I see… Then it makes me a little sad.
All I do is something that I regret….

$White Dragon Iona$
Ummm….
Sad or regret in several ways.
If I left Hafling sooner, I could have helped Geraint, and you wouldn’t be poisoned...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't feel bad. I will be beside you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
No… even when I was Chaos Dragon...
If I didn't fight with Beyond Dragon, Ancient Dragon wouldn't have become like that… and all the lives wouldn't have suffered so much. I'm so sorry that I don't know what to do.

$White Dragon Iona$
Hehe thanks. {user_nick}, it was a good idea that I asked you about it.
If not running away means following Telesia, then that wouldn't make any more things to regret about. Isn't it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's a little strange. Iona, what's wrong?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…I can trust that what I am doing is Telesia and that it is the right way? Can I believe that I'm doing the right thing to fulfill my mission...? (Iona somehow sounds desperate)

$White Dragon Iona$
(Iona is shivering)
I met many good adventurers. They all knew about the danger the Monolith was in and were trying to protect this world. I was touched how they never gave up even though they are weak humans.

$White Dragon Iona$
So I thought, how can I help all the adventurers fight in the Monolith? I told you before... That I can protect {user_nick} alone in Monolith... but that's my limit. I can't protect anymore than that.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You're scared? Just what kind of choice did you make?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…But I'm still weak. I can't protect everyone… So I had to make a choice. But after deciding, I became scared again. I was afraid I might be doing something wrong like last time.

$White Dragon Iona$
…I'm a being made up of memories. If I share my power that is holding my form to all the adventurers… then my form will disappear but I will still be able to fight with you guys at the Monolith...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So that's what you were sorry about just now!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…Eh. {user_nick} , you're an Elf but your reaction is the same as my other friends… who are humans…

$White Dragon Iona$
But I have already made the choice. I wanted to protect everyone. And everyone will be holding on to the power I give them. When everything is settled, come to Hafling and… my power will react with my jewel and I can be resurrected again.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Yeah. I think so. So I decided to share my power with everyone. But I suddenly felt scared.
…Because I was already fighting the Ancient Dragon when I came to my senses after being poisoned by Beyond Dragon….

$White Dragon Iona$
…I was scared I might do the same thing this time… I suddenly thought that when I wake up, I might be fighting with {user_nick} and the other adventurers…. Fighting with people who are precious to me...

$White Dragon Iona$
…And if you think about it, I’m not trying to do something bad, but I'm always the bad guy doing evil things. What should I do? Can I escape from this Telesia?

${user_nick}$
…!! Don't say that…!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Give him a powerful blow and be angry)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…But that's all I can think of right now… If that really is my Telesia, I hope I can just disappear here. Forever. So, I hope you can think about my Telesia since you're an Elf, and take this chance to completely get rid of my existence without resurrecting me….

$White Dragon Iona$
…Kurrrrrrghhh!… Ahhh.

${user_nick}$
Don’t even say that!
I've told you that although I don't know what Telesia is exactly, it is something that we shouldn't run away from!
You are trying to run away now!

$White Dragon Iona$
…But!

${user_nick}$
And "a Telesia bound to do evil things"?!
Was it something evil that you got to meet me?
Then how about all the other adventurers?!
You even promised to fight together!

$White Dragon Iona$
…But… But what if I hurt everyone…

${user_nick}$
Do you think the adventurers who remember you are going to let that happen? Do you think they will just stand around and watch you become evil?
And it's not you who did those evil things! It was the Beyond Dragon!

$White Dragon Iona$
…Ah…
(Iona is full of tears)

${user_nick}$
…Trust us, Iona.
As much as the trust you have in us to have decided to give your powers to everyone, we will trust you and go and meet you again.

$White Dragon Iona${action:Horrified}
…A-Angry Elf… So scary...
(Iona trembles in fear and doesn't dare to look into your eyes)

${user_nick}$
I've never been so angry my whole life. But what I said came from the bottom of my heart.
…Don't torment yourself alone. You have us now.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Yeah… Thank you. …Really really, thanks.
{user_nick}, I'm glad I met you.
(Iona smiles with tears still in his eyes)

$White Dragon Iona$
…Thanks. Then are you going to come and look for me later? Promise…?
Hehe… Then you must take care of yourself and stay alive.
My powers will protect you from the Monolith…
(Iona's body starts to shine)

${user_nick}$
(A clear energy can be felt around my body… is this Iona's power?)

${user_nick}$
(A Telesia bound to do evil things? I've never thought about that before. It sounds terrible. I’m sure it's not what She has for you, Iona.)

${user_nick}$
(I will go to Hafling and meet you again. And I will prove to you that such Telesia doesn't exist)

${user_nick}$
(Pala Telesia… Telesia, lead me to the ending that Iona wished for)

$Elf Elder$
....(He is deep in his thoughts)

${user_nick}$
(I should get going and meet the Elder)

$Elf Elder$
…You're here, {user_nick}. I just received this message.
You might want to take a look too.
(Elf Elder hands over a scroll)

$Lambskin Scroll$
To the respectable Elf Elder who represents all the Elves.
I apologize for sending dreadful news after many years void of formal communication.

$Lambskin Scroll$
We have come to an understanding that the Red Dragon is the king of the Dragon Followers, and that he is aiming for the Monolith.
We know that this thing called the Monolith is near the Elves' land.
It is said that the whole world with fall into chaos when something happens to the Monolith.

$Lambskin Scroll$
We know that the Elves have been guarding the Monolith all along, but we could not let the matter pass.
The Dragon Followers' king must be a human. We would like to send some reinforcements to help you protect the Monolith, so please inform us when you notice something happens to the Monolith.

$Elf Elder$
We can't reject them since they came to know about this now.
They are not wrong.

${user_nick}$
(It must be true that Iona met the other adventurers. That is why the Royal Castle is sending such letter.)

$Elf Elder$
I wonder how they got to know about this.
{user_nick}, did you inform them?

${user_nick}$
(Tell him about everything including Iona)

$Elf Elder$
…! Power of a Dragon…? That's amazing. The fact that a Dragon appeared here, and that several adventurers including you were chosen by him… Everything sounds like Telesia has been leading us.

${user_nick}$
Telesia… I don't know.
But I will do my best to stop the Dragon Followers and save everyone.

$Elf Elder$
(Elf Elder smiles)That's good. But now is not the time. Please save your energy until the real battle with the Dragon Followers starts.
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Elf Elder$
I will call you when it is time.
…But your eyes look swollen. Are you alright?
(Elf Elder looks worried about you)

*You have completed Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend

journal.title: For Hope 1
journal.contents:
You have decided to go to Elf Elder.
Based on what you've been through together so far, you might be able to convince him.
Talk to Elf Elder.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Elder

journal.title: For Hope 2
journal.contents:
Everything went well.
Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance and inform him.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - White Dragon Iona
journal.destination: Talk to Iona at Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance.

journal.title: For Hope 3
journal.contents:
Iona said he has something to tell you and asked you to come to the Forest of Waiting Noon alone.
Go to Forest of Waiting Noon.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Forest of Waiting Noon(White Dragon Iona)

*You cannot proceed in a party.
journal.todo_msg: Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Waiting Noon.

journal.title: For Hope 4
journal.contents:
Iona disappeared…
You have promised to meet him at Hafling but…
Think for a while on what to do next.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Forest of Waiting Noon (Where Iona disappeared)
journal.todo_msg: Compose your thoughts for a while where Iona disappeared.

journal.title: For Hope 5
journal.contents:
You have decided what to do.
Go to Elf Elder in front of the Tree of Life Entrance.
Talk to Elf Elder.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Elder
journal.destination: Go to Elf Elder after deciding

journal.title: [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] Completed
journal.contents:
Iona disappeared after leaving all his powers with you.
What is left to do now is to fight Red Dragon Feder at the Monolith.
Come back with victory.

* [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] has been completed.
journal.todo_msg: [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] has been completed.
